revision.comment: Created page with "{{Infobox item |name = Carbide Support |image = |caption = Boosts Agility by 35%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = [[Prize X-change Red]] |sell = [[Gold|G]] }} '''Carbide Supports''' are DLC [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}}. It can be purchased from [[Prize X-change Red]] in the [[Land of Challenge (XC3)|Land of Challenge]] for 6000 [[Noponstone]]s. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]..."

revision.text:
{{for|the Accessory in {{XC2|-}}|Carbon Gloves (XC2)}}
|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Carbon Gloves |image = XC3 Accessory Gauntlet.png |caption = Boosts Dexterity by 30%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 7320 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Carbon Gloves |image = XC3 Accessory Gauntlet.png |caption = Boosts Dexterity by 31%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 7320 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Carbon Gloves |image = XC3 Accessory Gauntlet.png |caption = Boosts Dexterity by 32%. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 7320 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Carbon Gloves''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}} and {{XC3FR|sublink}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]] [[Category:XC3FR Accessories]]

[[File:Cellar Bugworm.png|thumb|The Cellar Bugworm]] '''Caterpiles''' (Japanese: {{lang|ja|キャピル}}, ''Kyapiru'') are common caterpillar-like enemies in the {{XC|serieslink}}.
== {{XC|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Common Caterpile (normal)|Common Caterpile]] * [[Cute Caterpile]] * [[Eater Caterpile]] * [[Praying Caterpile]] * [[Royal Caterpile]] * [[Satorl Caterpile]]
=== Story Exclusive Enemy === * [[Common Caterpile (story)|Common Caterpile]]
=== Unique Monsters === * [[Cellar Bugworm]] * [[Verdant Bluchal]]
== {{XCFC|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemy === * [[Praying Caterpile]]
== {{XC2|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Crawler Caterpile (XC2)|Crawler Caterpile]] * [[Ground Caterpile]] * [[Magnl Caterpile]] * [[Vashar Caterpile]]
=== Challenge Battle Mode Enemies === * [[Bezille Caterpile]] * [[Garter Caterpile]]
== {{TTGC|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Chelta Caterpile (Dannagh Region)|Chelta Caterpile]] ([[Dannagh Region]]) * [[Chelta Caterpile (Lasaria Region)|Chelta Caterpile]] ([[Lasaria Region]]) * [[Dread Caterpile]]
=== Quest Exclusive Enemy === * [[Prado Caterpile]] (during ''[[Homegrown Inventor]]'')
=== Unique Monster === * [[Sleepwalker Mork]]
== {{XC3|-}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Baccura Caterpile]] * [[Braying Caterpile]] * [[Carrier Caterpile]] * [[Crawler Caterpile (XC3)|Crawler Caterpile]] * [[Rotten Caterpile]] * [[Wolder Caterpile]]
=== Unique Monster === * [[Rambler Curalie]]
== {{XC3FR|sub}} == === Normal Minor Enemies === * [[Baccura Caterpile]] * [[Crawler Caterpile (XC3)|Crawler Caterpile]] * [[Larval Caterpile]]
=== Unique Monster === * [[Troglodyte Umir]]
== Gallery == === {{XC|-}} === <gallery> Caterpile.jpg Cute Caterpile.jpg </gallery>
=== {{XC2|-}} === <gallery> VasharCaterpile.jpg Crawler Caterpile.png BezilleCaterpile.jpg Magnl Caterpile.png </gallery>
=== {{TTGC|-}} === <gallery> DreadCaterpile.jpg Chelta.jpg SleepwalkerMork.jpg </gallery>

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Cave Flier |image = Cave Flier XC3.jpg |caption = Cave Flier |category = Normal Minor Enemy |type = [[Flier]] |level = 23-24 |area = [[Dannagh Desert (XC3)|Dannagh Desert]]
[[Ribbi Flats]] |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = }} '''Cave Fliers''' are Normal Minor Enemies in {{XC3}}. They are members of the [[Flier]] family, and can be found at level 23-24 in [[Dannagh Desert (XC3)|Dannagh Desert]] or at [[Ribbi Flats]] in the [[Fornis Region]]. {{clr}} == In {{XC3FR|sub}} == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Cave Flier |image = Cave Flier FR.jpg |caption = Cave Flier |category = Normal Minor Enemy |type = [[Flier]] |level = 19 |area = [[Yesterdale]] |spawntime = Daytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = }} '''Cave Fliers''' are Normal Minor Enemies in {{XC3FR}}. They are members of the [[Flier]] family, and can be found at level 19 in [[Yesterdale]] during the day. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{Fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Minor Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Minor Enemies]] [[Category:Fornis Region Enemies]] [[Category:Yesterdale Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 21-25 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Level 16-20 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Fliers]] [[Category:XC3FR Fliers]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing drops]]

{{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Centuris |image = Centuris.jpg |caption = Centuris |category = Normal Minor Enemy |type = [[Levnis]] |level = 42-43 |area = [[Syra Hovering Reefs]]
[[Keves Castle]] |spawntime = Anytime |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = |cp = |sp = |gold = |hp = |strength = |healing = |dexterity = |agility = |physdef = |ethdef = |critrate = |guardrate = }} '''Centurises''' are Minor Enemies in {{XC3}}. They are [[Keves]]i [[Levnis]]es, and can be found at level 42 - 43 on the [[Syra Hovering Reefs]] and in [[Keves Castle]]. {{clr}} == In {{XC3FR|sub}} == {{Infobox XC3 Enemy |name = Centuris |image = Centuris FR.jpg |caption = Centuris |category = Normal Minor Enemy |type = [[Levnis]] |level = 39 |area = [[Vermilion Woods]] ([[Colony 5 Wreckage]]) |spawntime = After reaching the [[Black Mountains]] |respawn = Yes |movement = |detection = |exp = }} '''Centurises''' are Normal Minor Enemies in {{XC3FR}}. They are [[Keves]]i [[Levnis]]es, and can be found at level 39 near the [[Colony 5 Wreckage]] in [[Vermilion Woods]] after reaching the [[Black Mountains]]. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} {{fr stub}} [[Category:XC3 Minor Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Minor Enemies]] [[Category:Keves Castle Region Enemies]] [[Category:Vermilion Woods Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Level 41-45 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3FR Level 36-40 Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Levnises]] [[Category:XC3FR Levnises]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Exclusive Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Quest Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Challenge Battle Enemies]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3 Enemy pages needing drops]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing stats]] [[Category:XC3FR Enemy pages needing drops]]

|-|Common = {{Infobox item |name = Ceramic Underguard |image = File:XC3 Accessory Shirt.png |caption = Grants 90% resistance to Shackle Blocking. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Common |source = |sell = 20,210 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Rare = {{Infobox item |name = Ceramic Underguard |image = File:XC3 Accessory Shirt.png |caption = Grants 95% resistance to Shackle Blocking. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Rare |source = |sell = 20,210 [[Gold|G]] }} |-|Legendary = {{Infobox item |name = Ceramic Underguard |image = File:XC3 Accessory Shirt.png |caption = Grants 100% resistance to Shackle Blocking. |type = [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessory]] |xc3rarity = Legendary |source = |sell = 20,210 [[Gold|G]] }}
'''Ceramic Underguards''' are [[Accessory (XC3)|Accessories]] in {{XC3}}. {{clr}} {{xc3 stub}} [[Category:XC3 Accessories]]
